snippet: Flames that began in an ice cream shop quickly engulfed businesses along a stretch of boardwalk rebuilt after Hurricane Sandy left the area devastated.
abstract: Fire that began in Seaside Park ice cream shop quickly engulfs businesses along stretch of New Jersey shore's boardwalk that was rebuilt after Hurricane Sandy; winds sweep fire north along adjoining boardwalk of Seaside Heights; 400 firefighters from more than 30 towns finally contain fire.

byline.contributor: Karen DeMasters, Patrick McGeehan and Ravi Somaiya contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Flames that began in an ice cream shop quickly engulfed businesses along a stretch of boardwalk rebuilt after Hurricane Sandy left the area devastated.

headline.main: Boardwalk Fire Erases Months of Rebuilding at Jersey Shore
headline.print_headline: Boardwalk Blaze Erases Months Of Rebuilding at the Jersey Shore
